p: On November 22, 2019, a local newspaper, the Wuhan Evening News, reported that a patient with severe pneumonia of unknown cause was taken to Wuhan as an emergency transfer by helicopter from Xiangyang in Hubei Province, 325 kilometers from Wuhan [ 23]. Figure 2 shows the location of Xiangyang in relation to Wuhan. After November 22, there were no reports of pneumonia in the local media, although it was later confirmed that by December 30, 2019, there were 27 cases of pneumonia of unknown cause in Wuhan.
